021import net.tnemc.core.handlers.player.PlayerCloseEChestHandler;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
024import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
025import org.bukkit.event.EventPriority;
026import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
027import org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryCloseEvent;
028import org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryType;
029
030/**
031 * PlayerCloseInventoryEvent
032 *
033 * @author creatorfromhell
034 * @since 0.1.2.0
035 */
036public class PlayerCloseInventoryListener implements Listener {
037
038  @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
039  public void onClose(final InventoryCloseEvent event) {
040
041    if(event.getInventory().getType().equals(InventoryType.ENDER_CHEST)) {
042
043      final PlayerProvider provider = PluginCore.server().initializePlayer(event.getPlayer());
044      new PlayerCloseEChestHandler().handle(provider);
045    }
046  }
047}
